altername_name: Mathbooster: An Arithmatic Drill and Practice Program
name: Mathbooster
overview: Mathbooster is an educational game that masquerades as a Space Invaders type shooter. It was developed by Dean Hodgson and published by Australian based Satchel Software in 1985. Math Booster allows students to improve math skills by planing an exciting arcade-style game. Practice addition, subtraction, multiplication and division. The nature and difficulty of problems are easily adjusted to the individual student's needs.
